caption.p: X-ray Diffraction (XRD) profiles of glycerol (Gly) plasticized starch films (non-stored and stored films for 5 weeks) with different fatty acids ( a) Blank, ( b) Palmitic acid (PA), ( c) Stearic acid (SA), and ( d) Oleic acid (OA).
